mapper.select:
select
from cooperative_business order by add_time desc

update cooperative_business
business_name = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_login_name = #{businessLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_pass_word = #{businessPassWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
broker = #{broker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

update cooperative_business set business_name = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_login_name = #{businessLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_pass_word = #{businessPassWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, broker = #{broker,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: SELECT broker,count(*) as count from cooperative_business GROUP BY broker
